column1: Juan Guzmán ( born Hans Gutmann Guster , also known as " Juanito " , 28 October 1911 – 1982 ) was a German born Mexican photojournalist .He was known as a war photographer of the Spanish Civil War and later on his work with Mexican painters Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera .Hans Gutmann was born in Cologne .In 1936 he joined the Spanish Civil War as a volunteer of the International Brigades .Gutmann later became a Spanish citizen and changed his name to Juan Guzmán .There are more than 1,300 photographs from the Spanish Civil War in the archive of Agencia EFE ( Madrid ) .His most famous image is the picture of 17-year - old Marina Ginestà standing in top of Hotel Colón in Barcelona .It is one of the most iconic photographs of the Spanish Civil War .After the war Guzmán fled to Mexico , where he arrived in 1940 .He worked for major Mexican magazines and newspapers and became a friend of Frida Kahlo with whom Guzmán shared similar political views .In the 1950s he took a large number of photographs of Kahlo and her husband Diego Rivera .Guzmán also photographed the artwork of Mexican painters like Gerardo Murillo , Jesús Reyes Ferreira and José Clemente Orozco .Juan Guzmán died in Mexico City in 1982 .;his work;a German born Mexican photojournalist .He;('Frida Kahlo'
column2: 'Diego Rivera');his work on known a German born Mexican photojournalist .He;his work has an instance of a German born Mexican photojournalist .He;spouse;0

column1: Pacific Fair is a major shopping centre in Broadbeach Waters on the Gold Coast
column3: Australia .It was Queensland \'s largest regional shopping centre until 2006 .Pacific Fair was developed by Hooker Retail Developments and opened in 1977 on what was swampland with 96 specialty stores and two anchor tenants .Since then
column4: Pacific Fair has undergone numerous expansions and has grown to have more than 300 specialty stores and four anchor tenants .In January 2014
column5: work began on a major redevelopment project to meet the predicted regional growth on the Gold Coast .Prior to the redevelopment
column6: the shopping centre had four main major stores including a four - level Myer
column9: Coles and Toys \' R \' Us .Daimaru operated in the centre before its Australian withdrawal
column10: albeit briefly .It also had a 12-screen Birch Carroll and Coyle Cinema ( re - opened as Event Cinemas in late 2015 ) .Pacific Fair is a major public transport interchange on the Gold Coast
column12: and the Broadbeach South station located not far from the shopping centre .Nearby is The Star Gold Coast and Gold Coast Convention & Exhibition Centre .Pacific Fair fronts Little Tallebudgera Creek and is the southern end of the Surfers Riverwalk .This shopping centre was featured on the third season of The Mole .;Broadbeach Waters;Queensland;('Broadbeach Waters'
column13: 'Queensland');Broadbeach Waters in a major shopping centre on the Gold Coast
column14: Queensland;Broadbeach Waters is located on terrain feature on Queensland;located in the administrative territorial entity;0
